website_summaries.verdict: This model stands out for its looks and large display, but occasionally lacks in accuracy and responsiveness.
pros: Boasts contemporary styling in a trim design, so it's great for modern kitchens
Bold, backlit digital display is easy to read
Surface wipes clean with minimal effort
cons: Buttons are sometimes unresponsive, which can be quite frustrating when you need measurements quickly

customer_reviews.title: Eh, not impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice enough. But... the "Power" button works intermittently. The "Tare" button works never. The weight readings were bouncing all over the place as well. Finally figured out the unit was shipped with batteries that were nearly dead. New batteries fixed this issue but still the same issue with the buttons. I've had/used an Escali scale previously for years that I was happy with. This one, NOT so much. Ordered a replacement. We'll see what happens with that one.
customer_reviews.author: ut oh

customer_reviews.title: As a scale it works great, not so much as a diet incentive.
customer_reviews.text: The buttons are just touchscreen, so there isn’t a definitive press to the button, but they do work. The tare function works well, but because of the nature of the soft-touchy buttons, I usually just power it on with my measuring cup on it, which immediately sets to zero before ingredients are added. I love how small and flat it is, easily stored in a spice cabinet. And of course it looks great, easy to clean high gloss surface. I’m sure I’ll be getting fat with my new bread-making hobby with this scale for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: David Oleski

customer_reviews.title: Great product but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great product (retailed at ~$18)---but I choose to keep the Amazon Basics scale instead. Amazon Basics scale was accurate and cheaper (purchased it for $10.99). I wasn't sure if I would like using Escali since all buttons were on the same level (my baking friend recommended I don't get something like this). I have another Escali scale and like their quality and customer service. However--in the end---I felt the Amazon Basics scale was "just as good" and at a lower price
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great scale with a sleek look!
customer_reviews.text: The scale is just what I was looking for. It has a max capacity of 11 lbs., but is perfect to weigh my yarn and for my postal needs. It has a pretty and sleek face which should be easy to clean if used for cooking. The display is large and has a pretty blue backlit readout. It’s easy to use (only has 2 buttons). Make sure you are weighing on a hard and flat surface, or you may not get accurate measurements.
customer_reviews.author: LynneI

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for storage, it's thin, and for use, large enough to put containers of any size on it. Backlight makes for easy reading.
customer_reviews.author: Gwamsa

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it so I can get a more accurate measurement of portion sizes to aid my weight loss program. I love the bright color and large easy to read numbers on the display.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurately measures weight/ button to switch between metric & imperial stopped working after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: Have experience using food scales for years. Purchased the Escali Cairo C115R, admiring its sleek design, and to replace an old scale. After a day of use, the scale stopped allowing me to toggle between metric and imperial weights. And most importantly, it inaccurately weighs. I’ve returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: cyclist1

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, easy to use, attractive scale from a reputable manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: I use this scale to measure flour for gluten free baked goods. It is exactly the right size, accurate, easy to use with the tare weight feature and attractive as well. Nice and flat for easy storage - and Escali has a reputation for durability. All in all, this item is worth a few dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Rivard

customer_reviews.title: Escali kitchen scale
customer_reviews.text: I love my new scale, exactly what I been looking for
customer_reviews.author: AZ Desert

customer_reviews.text: great scale, well built. but the color is clearly not matching: photo was showing a navy blue, i received a teal blue ...

customer_reviews.title: easy to broke
customer_reviews.text: Less than 3 months with light use, it stop working. I don't see the last octet. When I press the number, I can see the numbers, but this is a scale.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape. Easy to use. Better than I was hoping for.

customer_reviews.title: Really Good!
customer_reviews.text: Overall , it’s a really good product is accurate, nice design , and really easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Works great for artisan bread recipes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I have a little trouble turning it off but seems to be very accurate
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Cute but it has some issues
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the sleek design. It fits well in a drawer. It is difficult to tare and therefore hard to use. Sometimes, it gives me phantom readings.
customer_reviews.author: chkngeorge

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Worst product, turns on and off by itself, measurement surface unevenly distributes weight, measures 1 g intervals not very accurate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I am recently cooking by weight and this is the perfect new addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen scale!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, nice size, and sleek look. I’m very happy with my new scale.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Capacitive buttons are touchy - Scale still performs well
customer_reviews.text: Every kitchen food scale I've owned has these touch sensitive buttons instead of a hard click mechanical button, but these seem particularly sensitive. I find myself bumping them by mistake a lot when moving the scale and accidentally turn it back on or change the units when putting it away. This is probably the most consistent scale I've ever owned, even with my fat fingers pushing buttons when I don't mean to. I have never had an issue taring it or getting an accurate reading of ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. I purchased and quickly realized none of the buttons responded consistently to turn on the scale, tare it or change the unit. Assuming it was a defective unit I returned for a replacement. Same exact defects in the second unit, which was so frustrating I gave up on the scale all together, returned the second one for a refund and got myself a reliable amazon basics scale that does exactly what its supposed to do, turn on, weight things and change units!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Sugrue

customer_reviews.title: Big bright display, works well
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen scale works well. It has an on/off button so you can easily turn the scale off when it's not in use to save the battery. Just hold the button for a few seconds and it will turn off. It also has a power saver function so it will automatically turn off when you don't use it. The tare function will let you put a container on the scale and account for that weight. The display is bright and backlit with large digits. The scale seems accurate when I weigh stuff. I think the price is a little high for a basic kitchen scale. But it works well and it's not a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: An Avid Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Small, easy to use but hard to change measurements
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice, it is a solid unit so easy to clean, no food parts getting under the plate. It turns on and off very easily. But it does not easily change from say, grams to ounces. That can become very annoying very quickly. The screen is illuminated with large easy-to-read numbers. All great stuff. Except that aside from changing measurements, the other issue is that it uses two button batteries (or watch batteries) which will be very annoying to change later. Two "AAA" batteries would have made this much easier to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: So Great looking it looks like a piece of art and easy to use except...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It's so good looking that I hung it on the wall and it looks like a piece of art. It's really easy to use except for one thing. To zero it, so you don't weigh the container, you have t fill the container while it is on the scale. (if I'm wrong, let me know, but that's what the instructions say and what I experienced. That said, it's easy to subtract out the weight of the container. Bottom line, I really like it, especially that it hangs on the wall and looks like art.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kall

customer_reviews.title: works great for us
customer_reviews.text: This scale has been working great for us. We use it both for mailing packages (up to 11 pounds) and for kitchen recipes (many recipes call for grams or dry ounces). Accuracy is just good as our old scale, but the big light-up display is much easier to read. Glass surface with touch-sensitive buttons is great for kitchen use since we can clean it by just wiping down. Flat surface is great for weighing large boxes. Uses 2032 flat batteries that we use for lots of other things and already have inexpensive spares at home.
customer_reviews.author: l2

customer_reviews.title: Basic scale
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for a basic kitchen scale, but isn't always accurate. We were hoping to use this to weigh PLA filament after 3D printing to get an estimate on cost for producing an item. It isn't quite accurate enough for that. It is okay for a quick estimate on shipping weight, but I don't trust it to always be correct.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Look for better
customer_reviews.text: Nice if you want to get a rough estimate of measurements. It did not read anything accurately. The bottoms sometimes work and then they just don't.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Thoms

customer_reviews.title: Slim Scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale hides away in your pantry easily. It works great! Just put it on the counter and turn it on, perhaps with whatever bowl you plan to measure in so it zeroes that weight too. Then go ahead and measure. The scale can be then turned off and stored behind the flour.
customer_reviews.author: Bror Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple scale
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, simple, and easy to use scale for food — liquid or dry weight — or small packages. Big numbers that are easy to read. The controls are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Wildness

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, seems to be accurate, easy to read, seem to be made well, good quality
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Can you Dig it?
customer_reviews.text: I wish this scale were larger. I don't like that in order to use the tare feature, one has to first place the container on the scale before it's turned on--in other words, there's no "tare" button. In my testing against other kitchen scales, it seems to be accurate in measure so it passes in its basic features. It takes too long to turn on and off and the backlight goes off way too soon. 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Woodbridge

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking Sleek Black Scale
customer_reviews.text: If this wasn't a scale, it could almost be sexy. Black and sleek, this little scale does its job well! Very accurate and shuffles between liquid volume and weight nicely. The lighting has a blue backlight, which is super cool looking and helps to read the numbers if the room is a bit dark. Large digital display makes for an easy read for those of us needing reading glasses! Cleaning is easy with a damp cloth and believe it or not, it can measure up to 11 pounds! I can measure some of my mail now before I send it!
customer_reviews.author: SanjeevP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and exact weights!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to get started using this scale. Comes with a detailed manual if you need it. It has a power on/off button and then it has a unit button that allows you to change from ounces to other measuring units. Very bright display and is very accurate with the weight output. Very compact and sleek design. Light weight and easy to grab and use when needed. *If this review made a difference for you, please let me know and click the "HELPFUL" button.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: Small, compact, kitchen scale. Great for baking and pastas
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple little kitchen scale. I use it when baking or making pasta since my recipes are all by weight. I'm annoyed that they're using small CR2032 batteries because I have so many AA and AAA always on hand but hopefully the batteries last a long time. I have no problems using any of the buttons to change the units or turn power on/off or tare. I tested the scale by weighing 500ml of water and it was about 6 grams off which could easily be due to human error on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Great for home and especially kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great digital scale for many reasons. First, it's powerful. It can weigh up to 11 pounds which means mail packages can be weighed for example. It can measure both dry and liquid ingredients by switching the tare/weight. It can weigh by the gram as well. I like having little scales like these to measure various things in my daily life. Really helpful for using with old recipes, overseas recipes especially for baking. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brett T

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale! I just started making my dogs food and this really helps to get the portions perfect. Using measuring cups you could be 30grams or so off, not with this! Very easy to use and LOVE the large, backlit digital numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Aliiiiiiiiiiiaaaaaaaaaaa

product_meta.title: Escali Ciro C115R Blue Backlit Digital Display Table Top Scale, Tare Functionality, Liquid and Dry Measurements, Office, Kitchen, 11lb Capacity, Red

Capable of weighing both liquid and dry ingredients up to 11 pounds with 0. 1 ounce or 1 gram increments. These scales have an easy to read back-light display and touch sensitive controls which makes the platform easy to clean. Touch Sensitive Controls: The touch sensitive controls create a single, smooth surface which is easy to wipe clean. Easy to Read Display: The blue back-light display is easy to read under any lighting environment. Liquid Measuring: Measures both liquid (fl oz, ml) and dry ingredients (g, oz, lb + oz). Automatic Shut-off: The scale will turn off after five minutes of inactivity to help conserve and extend battery life.
